text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun showed a glimpse of her tremendous 
ability in the Selection Race.
I'm looking around the school to see her again……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yukippe, hurry up, hurry up～! Don't you wanna 
go watch City run? Come on, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Wait a minute, Maya! A country girl like me shouldn't go to 
such a crowded place……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Geez, it's okay! 
Look, Maya will stay with you……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh? Could you be―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I knew it! You're the person I met at the Selection Race! Wow, we 
meet again! What are you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Huh? for Maya? 
Wow…… something like this―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Is like an adult situation～!! Kya～～～♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But but, Maya is in a hurry right now. 
I'd love to chat with you, but… umm……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh, yeah! You should come with us! 
You're fine with that right, Yukippe?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Huh? What, uh? 
Maya, what do you mean……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It's decided! 
In that case, TAKE-OFF!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Uhyaa!?

Together with Yukino Bijin, 
we were taken and headed towards an unknown destination―

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Here we are at the fourth turn! Gold City, coming from the 
outside! Tamamo Cross, chasing hard from behind!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'll show you my guts!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Like hell I'll let you……!!!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Wow, wow……! City-san, she's amazing……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah-yeah, City-san and Tamamo-san 
they're both sparkling!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I see… so you could go 'byuun' over 
there. Maya, didn't know that……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: The race of adult Uma Musume is exciting……!

Mayano Top Gun watched the race from start to finish 
with her twinkling eyes, as the top Uma Musume 
were competing against each other……

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Goal in! The winner of the race is TAMAMO CROSS! A close second 
place goes to Gold City!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ha, ha, ha…… 
Alright!! I won!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ah damn it, I missed the timing of the sprint……

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But that won't happen next time. I'll 
catch up with you, Tamamo-senpai.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Heh heh, whenever you want, City! I'll take you anytime!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that was an awesome race……! 
Tamamo-san and City-san were so cool… ……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I see, it was too early to go 'dan' there……! 
City-san understood that, amazing……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ugh～, The girls in these exciting races are so 
sparkly!! How nice… Maya wants to shine too……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! There are so many things that Maya doesn't know about big 
races like this, it's so exciting!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Adult Uma Musume who understand what Maya 
doesn't understand look so sparkling～!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
That's why, Maya also want to be like them! 
I want to shine in exciting races!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Sigh… Must be nice… Twinkle Series…… 
Maya can't wait to run there too～……!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Ah, me too……! G1 may still be a distant stage, 
but someday I will definitely…!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's get back to school 
and start training!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Eh-, training……?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
No! Maya won't do it. 
It's boring.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I'm off to explore the racetrack. 
Bye!!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Huh, Maya!? Ah～ there she goes……
choice_data_list: Is she not good at training?
Is that girl bad at training?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
No-no! There is probably nothing that Maya is not good at. 
She's an amazing girl who can do anything she puts her mind to!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
She got the hang of running on dirt on her first try, and I've 
never seen her struggle in the dance lessons for the Winning Live.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
She's also good at studying…… Anyway, 
Maya is amazing when she "gets it"!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Yes, Maya often says that. No matter what it is, if she says 
'I got it' she'll be good at it!

Thanks to Yukino Bizin, I was able to find out a little more 
about what Mayano Top Gun was capable of.
Apparently she has a natural ability to 'get it'―

In other words, it seems that she was born 
with amazing intuition that allows her to find 
the 'right answer'……!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
But for some reason, the training seems to be uninteresting to 
her…… I heard that she hasn't participated in any of the 
trainings since the first one.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Yes, ……but because of that, 
she got banned from all races, 
including simulations.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
I understand that a race is a place to show the results of your 
training, but…… I feel a little sorry for Maya……

The image of Mayano Top Gun 
wanting to race so badly flashes through my mind……
Can I do something about it……?
